resource.title: Motorbike Rental Liability Shield
resource.description: Educational legal template covering liability waivers, passport deposit debates, and bike condition handover checklists for hosts renting scooters.
resource.painPoint: Hosts renting scooters to tourists who lack licenses, creating massive liability if accidents occur.
keyFeatures: "Passport Deposit" debate: risks vs reality analysis
Bike condition handover checklist with photo documentation
